summary: Craft and upgrade anywhere around Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod contains three spells that allow you to craft and upgrade any where around Skyrim.

THREE SPELLS

1.Arcane forge- allows you to use the forge menu.
2.Arcane Workbench- allows you to use the Workbench menu.
3.Arcane Sharpening Wheel- allows you to use the Sharpening Wheel menu.

These spells are made for mage classes but can be used for any class.

To obtain these spells you must look in caves, dungeons and shops.
NOTE: The books wont be findable straight away so skip some in game days.

To get the spells straight away type psb in the console.
author: Marster13
